00:00 War Machine
After the success of the Amazon series "Reacher", all doors are open to lead actor Alan Ritchson. Now his path is leading him to the competition: he is shooting the science fiction action film "War Machine" for Netflix.
https://kinocheck.com/news/wcjrhs

01:37 Spider-Man 4
So far, the Spider-Man trilogy with Tom Holland has generally been in capable hands. But a few months ago came the shock: Jon Watts is not available for the upcoming movie. Now, according to The Hollywood Reporter, Marvel Studios has confirmed his successor: Destin Daniel Cretton is the new director for Spider-Man 4!
https://kinocheck.com/news/hvex29
